name: FIFA Manager 13
description: As a team manager in FIFA Manager 13, you have complete control over the management of a modern football club. With access to more than 40,000 licensed players, many of whom come with original player pictures, it’s up to you to make the decisions that will take your club to victory and win you fame and fortune. In this 12th edition of the franchise, you can get inside the player’s heads with the new Team Dynamics feature, which allows you to get an overview of team hierarchy, rivalry, personality clashes, personal goals, family relationships and much more. You will have to talk to your players, speak to their expectations and inspire their goals to build a strong team that can go the distance.
